name: Frog sweet frog
description:
Disclaimer: This game was made for the Global Game Jam 2019, 48 hours of pure developing and design.

FROG SWEET FROG

My mom, the frog. She is just amazing, she protect us in he mouth, unfortunelly life is hard and predators are coming, but mom has a plan! She will just shoot us at them and then use her large toungue to bring us back home.

I love my mom so much.

-Rodney the toadpole.

HOW TO PLAY:

  • Use A-D to move your aim.
  • Use H to shoot toadpoles.
  • Use J to shoot your toungue to grab toadpoles.
  • Destroy as many enemies as you can!!!!
